name: py-shapely
description: Manipulation and analysis of geometric objects in the Cartesian plane.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-cython
dependencies.description: The Cython compiler for writing C extensions for the Python language.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description:
NumPy is the fundamental package for scientific computing with Python.
It contains among other things: a powerful N-dimensional array object,
sophisticated (broadcasting) functions, tools for integrating C/C++ and
Fortran code, and useful linear algebra, Fourier transform, and random
number capabilities

dependencies.name: geos
dependencies.description:
GEOS (Geometry Engine - Open Source) is a C++ port of the Java Topology
Suite (JTS). As such, it aims to contain the complete functionality of
JTS in C++. This includes all the OpenGIS Simple Features for SQL
spatial predicate functions and spatial operators, as well as specific
JTS enhanced topology functions.

dependencies.name: py-pytest
dependencies.description: pytest: simple powerful testing with Python.

dependent_to.name: py-torchgeo
dependent_to.description:
TorchGeo: datasets, transforms, and models for geospatial data. TorchGeo
is a PyTorch domain library, similar to torchvision, that provides
datasets, transforms, samplers, and pre-trained models specific to
geospatial data.

dependent_to.name: py-datacube
dependent_to.description: An analysis environment for satellite and other earth observation data.

dependent_to.name: py-cartopy
dependent_to.description: Cartopy - a cartographic python library with matplotlib support.

dependent_to.name: py-imgaug
dependent_to.description:
A library for image augmentation in machine learning experiments,
particularly convolutional neural networks. Supports the augmentation of
images, keypoints/landmarks, bounding boxes, heatmaps and segmentation
maps in a variety of different ways.

dependent_to.name: py-pycortex
dependent_to.description: Python Cortical mapping software for fMRI data.

dependent_to.name: py-geopandas
dependent_to.description:
GeoPandas is an open source project to make working with geospatial data
in python easier. GeoPandas extends the datatypes used by pandas to
allow spatial operations on geometric types. Geometric operations are
performed by shapely. Geopandas further depends on fiona for file access
and descartes and matplotlib for plotting.
